ASPIRANTES.TITLE: Applicants
ASPIRANTES.INTRO: Start your path to professional excellence. Learn about the admission process and the requirements to join our university community.

STEPS.TITLE: Request Your Form
STEPS.TEXT: Complete the online registration form and obtain your admission form.

STEPS.TITLE: Take the Exam
STEPS.TEXT: Take the admission exam on the assigned date and time.

STEPS.TITLE: Enroll
STEPS.TEXT: If you pass, complete your enrollment and start your university career.

REQUIREMENTS: High school certificate or proof of studies
ASPIRANTES.CTA_TEXT: Our admissions team is ready to answer all your questions about the admission process.
